title: Cashier URL (response)
description: Cashier URL for the specified type.

cashier.title: cashier
cashier.description: Cashier URL. Note: possible error codes are: ASK_TNC_APPROVAL (API tnc_approval), ASK_AUTHENTICATE, ASK_UK_FUNDS_PROTECTION (API tnc_approval), ASK_CURRENCY (API set_account_currency), ASK_EMAIL_VERIFY (verify_email), ASK_FIX_DETAILS (API set_settings).

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id.
